bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext: $ rpm -q python3-faker python3 python3-faker-0.5.9-3.fc25.noarch python3-3.5.2-4.fc25.x86_64 $ whereis python3 python3: /usr/bin/python3.5m-config /usr/bin/python3.5-config /usr/bin/python3 /usr/bin/python3.5m-x86_64-config /usr/bin/python3.5 /usr/bin/python3.5m /usr/lib/python3.5 /usr/lib64/python3.5 /usr/include/python3.5m /usr/share/man/man1/python3.1.gz $ python3 -m 'faker' Traceback (most recent call last): File "/usr/lib64/python3.5/runpy.py", line 174, in _run_module_as_main mod_name, mod_spec, code = _get_module_details(mod_name, _Error) File "/usr/lib64/python3.5/runpy.py", line 133, in _get_module_details return _get_module_details(pkg_main_name, error) File "/usr/lib64/python3.5/runpy.py", line 109, in _get_module_details __import__(pkg_name) File "/usr/lib/python3.5/site-packages/faker/__init__.py", line 4, in <module> from faker.factory import Factory File "/usr/lib/python3.5/site-packages/faker/factory.py", line 10, in <module> from faker.config import DEFAULT_LOCALE, PROVIDERS, AVAILABLE_LOCALES File "/usr/lib/python3.5/site-packages/faker/config.py", line 13, in <module> AVAILABLE_LOCALES = find_available_locales(PROVIDERS) File "/usr/lib/python3.5/site-packages/faker/utils/loading.py", line 19, in find_available_locales provider_module = import_module(provider_path) File "/usr/lib64/python3.5/importlib/__init__.py", line 126, in import_module return _bootstrap._gcd_import(name[level:], package, level) File "/usr/lib/python3.5/site-packages/faker/providers/address/__init__.py", line 6, in <module> from .. import date_time File "/usr/lib/python3.5/site-packages/faker/providers/date_time/__init__.py", line 9, in <module> from dateutil import relativedelta ImportError: No module named 'dateutil'
